entryLink._name: Nagash, Supreme Lord of the Undead
Arkhan the Black, Mortarch of Sacrament
Arkhan the Black, Mortarch of Sacrament
Nagash, Supreme Lord of the Undead

characteristic.__text: Any Charge Phase
If no friendly units have used a **^^Relentless Discipline^^** ability this phase, pick a friendly **^^Ossiarch Bonereapers Hero^^** to use this ability.
For the rest of the turn, add 1 to charge rolls for friendly **^^Ossiarch Bonereapers^^** units while they are wholly within 12" of that **^^Hero^^**.
**^^Relentless Discipline^^**
Your Movement Phase
If no friendly units have used a **^^Relentless Discipline^^** ability this phase, pick a friendly **^^Ossiarch Bonereapers Hero^^** to use this ability.

For the rest of the turn, while they are wholly within 12" of that **^^Hero^^**, friendly **^^Ossiarch Bonereapers^^** units can use **^^Charge^^** abilities even if they used a **^^Retreat^^** ability in the same turn.
**^^Relentless Discipline^^**
Any Combat Phase
If no friendly units have used a **^^Relentless Discipline^^** ability this phase, pick a friendly **^^Ossiarch Bonereapers Hero^^** to use this ability.
For the rest of the turn, add 1 to wound rolls for combat attacks made by friendly **^^Ossiarch Bonereapers^^** units while they are wholly within 12" of that **^^Hero^^**.
**^^Relentless Discipline^^**
Any Charge Phase
If no friendly units have used a **^^Relentless Discipline^^** ability this phase, pick a friendly **^^Ossiarch Bonereapers Hero^^** to use this ability.
For the rest of the turn, friendly units’ melee weapons have **Anti‑charge (+1 Rend)** while they are wholly within 12" of that **^^Hero^^**.
**^^Relentless Discipline^^**
Your Movement Phase

If no friendly units have used a **^^Relentless Discipline^^** ability this phase, pick a friendly **^^Ossiarch Bonereapers Hero^^** to use this ability. All friendly **^^Ossiarch Bonereapers^^** units wholly within 12" of that **^^Hero^^** are the targets.
Add 2" to the Move characteristic of each target for the rest of the turn.
**^^Relentless Discipline^^**
Any Combat Phase
If no friendly units have used a **^^Relentless Discipline^^** ability this phase, pick a friendly **^^Ossiarch Bonereapers Hero^^** to use this ability.
For the rest of the turn, friendly **^^Ossiarch Bonereapers^^** have **^^Ward (5+)^^** while they are wholly within 12" of that **^^Hero^^**.
**^^Relentless Discipline^^**
Subtract 2 from the control scores of enemy units while they are within 12" of this unit.
Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase

For the rest of the turn, if the unmodified hit roll for a combat attack that targets this unit is 1-2, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the **^^Fight^^** ability has been resolved.
This unit has **^^Ward (5+)^^**.
Once Per Battle (Army), Deployment Phase
Pick up to 3 friendly **^^Ossiarch Bonereapers Cavalry^^** units to be the targets.
Each target can move 6" but cannot end that move in combat.
Your Shooting Phase
Pick up to 3 friendly **Mortek Crawler** units that are wholly within friendly territory and that have not used a **^^Move^^** ability this turn to be the targets
Add 1 to hit rolls for each target’s shooting attacks for the rest of the turn.
Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
Pick a friendly **Mortek Guard** unit that has been destroyed to be the target.
Roll a dice. On a 5+, set up a replacement unit with half the number of models from the target unit (rounding up) on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units
Add 1 to casting rolls for friendly **^^Ossiarch Bonereapers Infantry Wizards^^**.
If the unmodified hit roll for an attack that targets this unit is 1-3, the attack fails and the attack sequence ends.
Subtract 1 from wound rolls for shooting attacks that target friendly **^^Ossiarch Bonereapers^^** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.
Subtract 2 from charge rolls for enemy units while they are within 12" of this unit.
Your Hero Phase
If there is not a friendly **Bone‑tithe Shrieker** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **^^Ossiarch Bonereapers Wizard^^** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Set up a **Bone-tithe Shrieker** wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.
Your Hero Phase
If there is not a friendly **Nightmare Predator** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **^^Ossiarch Bonereapers Wizard^^** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Set up a **Nightmare Predator** wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.
Your Hero Phase
If there is not a friendly **Soulstealer Carrion** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **^^Ossiarch Bonereapers Wizard^^** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Set up a **Soulstealer Carrion** wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.
Your Hero Phase
Pick a friendly **^^Ossiarch Bonereapers Wizard^^** to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly **^^Ossiarch Bonereapers^^** unit within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
The target's combat attacks score critical hits on unmodified hit rolls of 5+ until the start of your next turn.
**^^Spell^^**, **^^Unlimited^^**
Your Hero Phase
Pick a friendly **^^Ossiarch Bonereapers Wizard^^** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Until the start of your next turn, subtract 1 from hit rolls for the target’s attacks and subtract 1 from save rolls for the target.
Your Hero Phase
Pick a friendly **^^Ossiarch Bonereapers Wizard^^** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Roll a number of dice equal to the number of models in the target unit. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.
